cards.name: Goblin Berserker
cards.description: A fierce goblin warrior that charges into battle with reckless abandon.

cards.name: Water Elemental
cards.description: A living being of pure water. Its fluid form deflects many attacks.

cards.name: Air Spirit
cards.description: A swift spirit of the winds. Fast but fragile.

cards.name: Earth Guardian
cards.description: A massive stone sentinel that guards the ancient places. Slow but nearly indestructible.

cards.name: Skeleton
cards.description: An animated skeleton warrior. Basic undead soldier raised from the grave.

cards.name: Fireball
cards.description: Launches a ball of flame at target creature, dealing 4 damage.

cards.name: Healing Rain
cards.description: Restores 5 life to your hero. A gentle rain that mends wounds.

cards.name: Lightning Bolt
cards.description: Strikes target creature with lightning for 3 damage. Fast and efficient.

cards.name: Stone Wall
cards.description: Summons a 0/6 wall creature with the Wall ability. Cannot attack but provides defense.

cards.name: Drain Life
cards.description: Deals 3 damage to target creature and heals you for 3 life. Death feeds on life.
